name: Brainly Dark
description: A style I wrote for myself during my highschool years that I promptly forgot to upload. While it is somewhat old, the website hasn't changed much so it still looks pretty sleek. I may update this, if not feel free to upload an updated version with the same license.
additional_info:
You can contribute to this style or report an issue here: https://github.com/Raeffion/FireFoxCSS/tree/master
